welcome_message_body: Welcome to Charlotte, where southern hospitality meets urban charm! Explore our vibrant city known for its incredible food, rich history, and exciting cultural scene. We hope you have a fantastic time discovering all that Charlotte has to offer.

restaurants.name: Don Tequilas
restaurants.description: Don Tequilas is a mexican restaurant located in Charlotte.

restaurants.name: Fay's Evelyn Bay Coffee
restaurants.description: Fay's Evelyn Bay Coffee is a café located in Charlotte.

restaurants.name: Riedy's Pizza
restaurants.description: Riedy's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Charlotte.

restaurants.name: Jet's Pizza
restaurants.description: Jet's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Charlotte.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Charlotte.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport houses the majority of the airport's services and facilities.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary hub for American Airlines at Charlotte Douglas Airport, offering domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines, with a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is home to United Airlines at Charlotte Douglas Airport, as well as several other domestic and international carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves a variety of airlines, including JetBlue, Frontier, and Southwest.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock Hill Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Rock Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.
